name: Basketball Dunk Hoop 2019
description:
For the sports games fan, this new basketball game will be an awesome add to his collection, Play the full court basketball match against the rivals and superstars!Full court gameplay with all players control, you will defiantly enjoy the animations aw realistic looks of the players models. It’s all here in your palm is a basketball court, Run, collect the ball, jump, score point and defend the rival from scoring points!Do practice well in practice mode and make yourself a dunking master to beat the world champion teams and grab the crown of the star players.
Features:
• Full Basketball court Play.
• Cheering crowd.
• Practice mode.
• Skill shots.
• Realistic player and animations.
• Choose in many teams.
• Different modes to play.
• Upgrades and Rewards.
